thread.section_title: The Knife Merchant, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Knife Merchant, Inc | www.knifemerchant.com
thread.title: Robert H.
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by Robert H.

author: Robert H.
title: Robert H.
text:
I purchased a Masahiro Medium 1000 Grit Waterstone from Knife Merchant. My order was easily processed, shipped quickly, and arrived on-time and in great condition. Packaging was very protective and shipping receipt was included. The product has been a dream to use and has breathed new life into my old knives. Thank you again for the wonderful service.
Sincerely,
Robert H.
Moyock, NC
